text: Giuseppe Zamberletti (17 December 1933 â€“ 26 January 2019) was an Italian politician. He was born in Varese, Italy. He was the Minister of Protezione Civile from 1982 to 1987 and Senator from 2004 to 2009. Zamberletti died on 26 January 2019 in Varese from complications of Alzheimer's disease at the age of 85.E' morto Giuseppe Zamberletti, padre della protezione civile ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography at ISPRO Protezione Civile Wiki encyclopedia Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Politicians from Lombardy Category:People from Varese
title: Giuseppe Zamberletti
